Audio.Author: William Agudelo
Audio.Comments: Nocturnal sound heard at residential semi-forested urban area in Medellin city at 1450-1500 masl, C Andes of Colombia. Tropical Screech-Owls have been heard and seen roosting in the palm trees here. This noise was almost going all night long. ANY IDEAS? - recorded by William Agudelo.Ave nocturna escuchada en un conjunto residencial urbano con algo de areas verdes y matorral en Medellin a unos 1450-1500 msnm en la Cordillera Central de Colombia. Megascops choliba ha sido visto y escuchado aqui en palmeras. Este sonido estuvo presente durante toda la noche. ALGUNA IDEA? - grabado por William Agudelo.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`Jesse Fagan on XC facebook group:Pseudoscops clamator, me suena un pocohe is absolutely right!!!..mystery solved!bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
